title: Integrated Workshop on Visual Psychology and Fashion Design Methodology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic design principles and understanding of visual arts theory
context.additional_context: Practice-centered educational design considering learner roles (leader/manager), with a focus on strengthening visual communication skills using digital tools

learning_goals: Principles of visual psychology (e.g., form perception, color theory) can be applied to fashion design elements
Evidence-based design strategies can be established to predict target customers' visual responses
Development and presentation of fashion concepts applying visual psychological approaches through team-based projects
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
